description: Everyone remembers that Seth Bond topped Lance Alexander not to long ago. Every time Lance sees Seth he reminds him he owes him a fuck. After a day at the beach naked and and blowing each other they head back and Seth decides it is time to pay up. Dylan Lucas Exclusive's Lance Alexander tops our latest Exclusive Seth Bond for one of the best and hottest scenes I was lucky enough to watch...oh wait, I meant work on. Enjoy two of our hottest guys in a hot scene! 'Lance Alexander Fucks Seth Bond!'
title: Lance Alexander Fucks Seth Bond
